insert into t_technicist (name, major_type, id_type, id_number, sex, age, work_year, duty, title, school, graduation_date, degree, education_background, major, title_major, start_time, title_time, start_contract, end_contract, post, mapping_year, special_post, affirm, user_id, create_time, modify_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{titleTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startContract,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endContract,jdbcType=DATE}, #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mappingYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_technicist set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_type = #{majorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_year = #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education_background = #{educationBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_major = #{titleMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, title_time = #{titleTime,jdbcType=DATE}, start_contract = #{startContract,jdbcType=DATE}, end_contract = #{endContract,jdbcType=DATE}, post = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapping_year = #{mappingYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, special_post = #{specialPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, affirm = #{affirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, major_type, id_type, id_number, sex, age, work_year, duty, title, school, graduation_date, degree, education_background, major, title_major, start_time, title_time, start_contract, end_contract, post, mapping_year, special_post, affirm, user_id, create_time, modify_time from t_technicist where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
